name: Rental Assistance Distribution Component
description: If you need help with back rent, please call the RADCo intake line at (415) 470-5211 or email us at Eligibility: - Live in San Francisco and are not a Housing Authority tenant - Household has sufficient income to pay future rent and expenses - Plan to stay in your home for at least six months Open Hours: - Monday, Wednesday, Friday: 10AM to 11:30AM and 1PM to 2:30PM Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-470-5211 - Email: EDCRADCo@evictiondefense.org
fullDescription: If you need help with back rent, please call the RADCo intake line at (415) 470-5211 or email us at Eligibility: - Live in San Francisco and are not a Housing Authority tenant - Household has sufficient income to pay future rent and expenses - Plan to stay in your home for at least six months Open Hours: - Monday, Wednesday, Friday: 10AM to 11:30AM and 1PM to 2:30PM Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-470-5211 - Email: EDCRADCo@evictiondefense.org
whatTheyOffer: If you need help with back rent, please call the RADCo intake line at (415) 470-5211 or email us at Eligibility: - Live in San Francisco and are not a Housing Authority tenant - Household has sufficient income to pay future rent and expenses - Plan to stay in your home for at least six months Open Hours: - Monday, Wednesday, Friday: 10AM to 11:30AM and 1PM to 2:30PM Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-470-5211 - Email: EDCRADCo@evictiondefense.org
howToGetIt: Drop-in during business hours. Outside of business hours we can be contacted by phone (415) 470-5211or via email edcradco@evictiondefense.org
address: 976 Mission Street, 1st Floor, San Francisco, CA, 94103
keywords: i missed the last rent payment and i need help paying it
